by Skial Bainn published on Thursday 29th May 2014
Suggest a link Correct this issue

# Haxe Roundup № 161

Grapefrukt released Rymdkapsel, written in Haxe, which is a strategy game "where you take command of a space station and its minions", has a write-up in theverge.

A new library, protoc-gen-haxe, which is a Protocol Buffers implementation in Haxe and it's more powerful than protohx, fully endorsed by the protohx author.

OpenFL has launched their professional services, currently providing app marketing, app publishing and enterprise support.

Lars has released a new library, FireTongue, brilliant name by the way, which is a translation / localization framework and adapted from Defender's Quest code. It already has an HaxeFlixel demo!

Ronan has released openfl-stage3d, a library that implements stage3d on top of OpenFL using GLSL.

And if your in the San Francisco Bay Area, then join the Haxe group!
